alert.note: Alert for Atkinson; Coffee; Jeff Davis (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 5:30AM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Coffee, northwestern Atkinson and southwestern Jeff Davis Counties through 615 AM EDT... At 529 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Pineview to near Baconton. Movement was southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Willacoochee, Broxton, Ambrose, Pridgen and Snipesville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
